member.name: M:PrimS.Telnet.Client.TryLoginAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to login asynchronously, passing in a default LineTerminator of ">".
member.param: The line feed to use. Issue 38: According to RFC 854, CR+LF should be the default a client sends. For backward compatibility \n maintained.
member.returns: True if successful.

member.summary: Tries to login asynchronously.
member.param: The line feed to use. Issue 38: According to RFC 854, CR+LF should be the default a client sends. For backward compatibility \n maintained.
member.returns: True if successful.

member.name: T:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream
member.summary: Contract of core functionality provided by a ByteStream.

member.name: P:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream.Available
member.summary: Gets the amount of data that has been received from the network and is available to be read.
member.value: The number of bytes of data received from the network and available to be read.
member.exception: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket. See the Remarks section for more information.

member.name: P:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream.Connected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is connected.

member.name: P:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream.ReceiveTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time this will wait to receive data once a read operation is initiated.
member.value: The time-out value of the connection in milliseconds. The default value is 0.

member.name: M:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream.Close
member.summary: Disposes the instance and requests that the underlying connection be closed.

member.name: M:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream.ReadByte
member.summary: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.returns: The unsigned byte cast to an integer, or -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.exception: The stream does not support reading.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream.WriteByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte.
member.param: The byte to write to the stream.
member.exception: The stream does not support writing, or the stream is already closed.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream, advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.
member.param: The buffer to write data from.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer from which to begin copying bytes to the stream.
The maximum number of bytes to write.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is System.Threading.CancellationToken.None.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
member.exception: The offset or count is negative.

The offset parameter is less than 0.-or- The offset parameter is greater than the length of buffer.-or- The size parameter is less than 0.-or- The size parameter is greater than the length of buffer minus the value of the offset parameter.
The stream does not support writing.
The stream is currently in use by a previous write operation.

member.name: M:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStream.WriteAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a string to the current stream, advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.
member.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is System.Threading.CancellationToken.None.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
member.exception: The stream does not support writing.
The stream is currently in use by a previous write operation.

member.name: T:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStreamHandler
member.summary: Contract of core functionality required to interact with a ByteStream.

member.name: M:PrimS.Telnet.IByteStreamHandler.ReadAsync(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Reads for up to the specified timeout.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous read action.
